column4: does anyone have a problem with jaunty not turning off your monitor for power saving mode?
instead of my monitor going off it blinks "no signal"
Sounds like Jaunty is doing fine.  I think you're looking for blank screensaver?
Jaunty can't turn off the monitor.  That's physical hardware.  Monitor blinks no signal because Jaunty did what it should, standby, I suppose.
